sentences.en: <?pcdata . ?>come on, shake a leg. .
sentences.cn: 快，振作起来！。

sentences.en: a team with more experience than you can shake a stick at.
sentences.cn: 一支经验丰富的球队。

sentences.en: Emotional conflict may shake the foundations of even the strongest relationship.
sentences.cn: 情感冲突可以动摇哪怕是最牢固的人际关系的基础。

sentences.en: Give the bottle a good shake before use.
sentences.cn: 使用前要用力摇晃瓶子

sentences.en: He sent his driver to fetch him a strawberry shake.
sentences.cn: 他让司机去给他买一杯草莓奶昔。

sentences.en: He stifled his temptation to take hold of Ivy and shake her.
sentences.cn: 他压抑住想要抓住艾薇摇晃她的冲动。

sentences.en: His confidence was badly shaken.
sentences.cn: 他的自信心受到很大的打击。

sentences.en: His eyes misted over and he started to shake.
sentences.cn: 他泪眼模糊，开始颤抖起来。

sentences.en: I do not believe he gave the industry a fair shake.
sentences.cn: 我不相信他公正地对待了该产业。

sentences.en: I was unable to shake off my self-pity.
sentences.cn: 我无法摆脱自怜自哀的情绪。

sentences.en: I'll be back to you in two shakes.
sentences.cn: 我马上就回来。

sentences.en: I've even seen her shake Zara when she's been naughty.
sentences.cn: 我甚至见过她在扎拉淘气的时候使劲摇晃她。

sentences.en: it is no great shakes as a piece of cinema.
sentences.cn: 作为一部影片它没有什么特别的。

sentences.en: It won't shake the football world if we beat Torquay.
sentences.cn: 即便我们击败了托基队也不能撼动足球界。

sentences.en: No amount of reasoning could shake him out of his conviction.
sentences.cn: 再怎样跟他讲道理都不能让他放弃自己认准的事。

sentences.en: Palmer gave a sad shake of his head.
sentences.cn: 帕尔默难过地摇了摇头。

sentences.en: Shake him gently to see if he responds.
sentences.cn: 轻轻摇晃他看他是否有反应。

sentences.en: Shake off any excess flour before putting livers in the pan.
sentences.cn: 将多余的面粉抖落干净，再把肝脏放进锅中。

sentences.en: Shake the bottle before you open it.
sentences.cn: 打开瓶子之前先摇一摇。

sentences.en: She picked up the bag of salad and gave it a shake.
sentences.cn: 她拿起色拉袋晃了晃。

sentences.en: she shook her head in disbelief.
sentences.cn: 她不相信地摇了摇头。

sentences.en: She shook him to wake him up.
sentences.cn: 她摇摇他，想把他叫醒。

sentences.en: Sheedy has shaken off a calf injury.
sentences.cn: 希迪的小腿伤康复了。

sentences.en: The car shook as it went over a bump.
sentences.cn: 汽车驶过一个隆起的地方时颠了一下。

sentences.en: The little boy’s hand was shaking.
sentences.cn: 这小男孩的手在发抖。

sentences.en: The whole house started to shake.
sentences.cn: 整幢房子摇晃起来。

sentences.en: They shake their heads and mutter darkly.
sentences.cn: 他们一边摇头，一边阴沉地小声嘀咕。

sentences.en: they shook on the deal.
sentences.cn: 他们握手成交了。

sentences.en: When events happen that shake these beliefs, our fear takes control.
sentences.cn: 当一些事情的发生动摇这些信念时，恐惧就会占据我们的心灵。

sentences.en: While the water was heating she decided to shake out the carpet.
sentences.cn: 趁着烧水的时候，她决定将地毯抖抖干净。

words.tran_cn: 可动摇的；可震动的；可摇动的
摇晃的；不可靠的；不坚定的
受到严重打击的；心绪不宁的
虚弱不堪地；颤抖着；摇动着
颤抖；摇晃；不稳固；不可靠
可装配为木箱的各个部件；一捆；（英）禾束堆

phrases.phrase: get (或 give ) someone a fair shake
in two shakes (of a lamb's tail)

phrases.tran_cn: 奶昔（牛奶和冰淇淋等的混合饮料）

phrases.phrase: more —— than one can shake a stick at
shake (或 quake) in one's shoes (或 boots)
shake hands (with someone) (或 shake someone by the

phrases.tran_cn: [口语](和解等时)握手，握手言和
摇头（表示拒绝、否认、不赞成或怀疑）
(北美，非正式)向某人敲诈钱财

phrases.phrase: shake the dust off one's feet
phrases.tran_cn: 愤怒地离开；轻蔑地离开

trans.tran_en: if you give something a shake, you move it up and down or from side to side
to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this

trans.tran_cn: [shook-shaken] 摇动， 摇； 颤抖， 震动
trans.tran_en: to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this

trans.tran_cn: 摇动，抖动，动摇，摇头，颤抖，握手，使非常震惊/烦恼，摆脱
trans.tran_en: to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this
to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this
